name: PullBullet
releaseNotes:
- Access Tokens are now saved to your files to make update process easier.
- Also fixed bug where update was downloading PushBullet shortcut

name: PullBullet
releaseNotes: - Access Tokens are now saved to your files to make update process easier.

name: PullBullet
releaseNotes: - Added the new behaviour when { returnContent: true } is passed as shortcut input, shortcut returns pulled content rather than opening in share sheet or copying to clipboard

name: PullBullet
releaseNotes: - Supports pushing text larger than 1 MB\n- Improved push type inferencing\n- Added user choice menu for shortcut updates

name: PullBullet
releaseNotes: - Update checks now happen at the end of shortcut action rather than beginning\n-Fixed update bug

name: PullBullet
releaseNotes: - Migrated to use GitHub Pages for remote updates instead of UpdateKit, resulting in much faster performance.
